gbmj.tile



enum Suit: int;
Typecode for the suit of a tile.

alias Rank = uint;
Type for the rank of a tile.

enum Rank[] maxOfSuit;
The number of different tiles of a suit.

enum int[] duplicationOfSuit;
The number of duplications of a tile.

struct Tile;


int opCmp(Tile rhs);
opCmp for sorting

const void toString(scope void delegate(const(char)[]) sink, FormatSpec!char fmt);
String representation.

Params:
void delegate(const(char)[]) sink continuation
FormatSpec!char fmt spec 'c' for unicode character representation; other for ascii two-character representation.
